body.bibl: Destefanis, Simona. “‘On the Torments of Hell’ and ‘On the Delights of the Kingdom’ by Damyanos of Alqosh (19th Century).” In Studi Afroasiatici: XI Incontro Italiano Di Linguistica Camitosemitica / Afro-Asiatic Studies: 11th Italian Meeting of Afro-Asiatic Linguistics, edited by Alessandro Mengozzi, 403–6.
